statements: SELECT * FROM TransportationData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT route_name, distance, fuel_consumed FROM TransportationData WHERE carbon_emissions > 100;
SELECT id, start_location, end_location FROM TransportationData WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM TransportationData ORDER BY fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT end_location, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM TransportationData GROUP BY end_location HAVING total_fuel_consumed > 500;
SELECT * FROM TransportationData WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY start_location ASC
SELECT route_name, distance, fuel_consumed FROM TransportationData WHERE fuel_consumed < 20 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT id, start_location, end_location FROM TransportationData WHERE carbon_emissions > 50 AND fuel_consumed < 30 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM TransportationData WHERE start_location='City A' OR end_location='City B' ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, fuel_consumed FROM TransportationData WHERE end_location LIKE '%Beach%' ORDER BY route_name ASC
SELECT * FROM routes
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE fuel_consumption < 10
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_efficiency > 20
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, max_capacity FROM vehicles
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, fuel_consumption FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT start_location, end_location, MAX(distance) AS max_distance FROM routes GROUP BY start_location, end_location
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance / fuel_consumption AS efficiency_ratio FROM routes ORDER BY efficiency_ratio DESC
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, fuel_consumption FROM routes WHERE fuel_consumption < 5 AND (start_location LIKE 'A%' OR end_location LIKE 'B%')
SELECT * FROM TransportationRoutes;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT end_location, start_location FROM TransportationRoutes ORDER BY start_location DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, date FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_type = 'gasoline';
SELECT vehicle_id, emissions FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE emissions > 5 ORDER BY emissions DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, time_estimate FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed, distance_covered, date FROM FuelConsumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, emissions, date FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE emissions < 50 ORDER BY emissions ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE start_location LIKE 'Los%' OR end_location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed, distance_covered, date FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel' ORDER BY fuel_consumed DESC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY origin_location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT route_id, distance, estimated_time FROM routes WHERE distance > 1000 ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance FROM routes WHERE estimated_time < 120 ORDER BY destination_location
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_consumption_rate < 10 AND fuel_type='Diesel'

SELECT emissions_data.emission_id, routes.origin_location, vehicles.vehicle_type, emissions_data.carbon_emissions FROM emissions_data INNER JOIN routes ON emissions_data.route_id = routes.route_id INNER JOIN vehicles ON emissions_data.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance, estimated_time FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY estimated_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_type, fuel_capacity, fuel_consumption_rate FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity >= 50 ORDER BY fuel_consumption_rate ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT emission_id, route_id, vehicle_id, carbon_emissions, timestamp FROM emissions_data WHERE carbon_emissions < 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT result_id, route_id, fuel_saved, carbon_emissions_saved, optimization_date FROM optimization_results WHERE carbon_emissions_saved > 5 AND fuel_saved > 10 ORDER BY optimization_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance, estimated_time FROM routes WHERE estimated_time BETWEEN 30 AND 60 ORDER BY route_id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 50;
SELECT source_location, destination_location, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, estimated_time FROM routes WHERE estimated_time < '08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM fuel_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_id, source_location, destination_location FROM routes WHERE estimated_time > '02:00:00' ORDER BY source_location ASC;
SELECT route_id, source_location, destination_location, distance FROM routes WHERE source_location LIKE '%City%' AND destination_location LIKE '%Town%' ORDER BY distance ASC;

SELECT route_id, source_location, destination_location, distance, estimated_time FROM routes INNER JOIN optimizations ON routes.route_id = optimizations.route_id WHERE optimizations.efficiency_score > 0.8 ORDER BY estimated_time ASC;

SELECT route_id, source_location, destination_location, carbon_emissions FROM routes INNER JOIN emissions ON routes.route_id = emissions.route_id WHERE carbon_emissions < 50 ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC LIMIT 3;
